annotation.spannedText: they can be misled by myths about the supposed dangers of childhood vaccination

annotation.spannedText: whooping cough vaccine causes brain damage

annotation.spannedText: There is no truth to any of these claims

annotation.spannedText: it’s absolutely clear these myths are just that, myths

annotation.spannedText: after being vaccinated their children were diagnosed with neurological disorders, what they called “brain damage”

classMention.mentionClass: after being vaccinated their children were diagnosed with neurological disorders, what they called “brain damage”

annotation.spannedText: it was a coincidence

classMention.mentionClass: it was a coincidence

annotation.spannedText: It was disastrous that the medical and epidemiological professions didn’t respond after the kids were shown on television with the claims of vaccine caused brain injury

classMention.mentionClass: It was disastrous that the medical and epidemiological professions didn’t respond after the kids were shown on television with the claims of vaccine caused brain injury

annotation.spannedText: it’s a tragedy that it took an epidemic to prove that vaccination is protective

classMention.mentionClass: it’s a tragedy that it took an epidemic to prove that vaccination is protective

annotation.spannedText: whooping cough vaccines were protective against brain damage and not causing it

classMention.mentionClass: whooping cough vaccines were protective against brain damage and not causing it

annotation.spannedText: Several major studies

classMention.mentionClass: Several major studies

annotation.spannedText: The misguided belief that vaccination causes SIDS is also a case of myth by coincidence

classMention.mentionClass: The misguided belief that vaccination causes SIDS is also a case of myth by coincidence

annotation.spannedText: SIDS is linked strongly to lying babies on their face or having their head covered with bedding or toys

annotation.spannedText: the research

classMention.mentionClass: the research

annotation.spannedText: The myth that the MMR vaccine causes autism is particularly naughty

classMention.mentionClass: The myth that the MMR vaccine causes autism is particularly naughty

annotation.spannedText: it’s absolutely crucial that medical researchers obtain solid laboratory data about new and combination vaccines, test them rigorously and obtain very good surveillance and monitoring data

classMention.mentionClass: it’s absolutely crucial that medical researchers obtain solid laboratory data about new and combination vaccines, test them rigorously and obtain very good surveillance and monitoring data

annotation.spannedText: The public must have confidence that the research is done and done well

classMention.mentionClass: The public must have confidence that the research is done and done well

annotation.spannedText: Vaccination is a wonderful development in public health

classMention.mentionClass: Vaccination is a wonderful development in public health

annotation.spannedText: The benefits of vaccination outweigh the very small risk of unwanted side effects
